name: xvii/satelles-odf-relatio
description: A powerful PHP library for processing ODF (OpenDocument Format) templates with dynamic content, multiple export options and format conversion support. Perfect for generating dynamic reports, documents and forms.

suggest.picqer/php-barcode-generator: Generate barcodes to use in templates
suggest.endroid/qr-code: Generate QRs to use in templates
suggest.josh-gaby/cups-ipp: Send generated reports direct to printer
suggest.ext-bcmath: Barcode IMB (Intelligent Mail Barcode) needs bcmath extension
suggest.ext-gd: For JPG and PNG generators, GD or Imagick is required
suggest.ext-imagick: For JPG and PNG generators, GD or Imagick is required
